title: Teen girl dies after accidentally being shot in the head in Tempe
content:
TEMPE, AZ (3TV/CBS 5) -
A teen girl has died after police said she was accidentally shot by a family member in Tempe.
Paramedics were called out to the area of University Drive and Rural Road just before 10 p.m. on Monday.
The girl was found shot in the head and taken to the hospital with life-threatening injuries, police said. She later died at the hospital.
According to authorities, a family was "manipulating a gun" in the house when the firearm went off and the girl was hit.
An investigation is underway.
